sentences.english: A partitioning key should include one to three columns.
sentences.chinese: 一個分區鍵應該包括一至三個列。

sentences.english: A check box is toggled by pressing the spacebar.

sentences.english: Tingshuo uses the shift and back space key correctly.
sentences.chinese: 朔寶能正確運用移位鍵和退格鍵。

sentences.english: Every post will have a random string as the unique key.

sentences.english: At that time, it had only been demonstrated that RNA could cleave or ligate phosphodiester bonds.

sentences.english: Usually the table partitioning key will be a time-based column.
sentences.chinese: 通常表分區鍵是基於時間的列。

sentences.english: Set this key to the command used to create thumbnails for themes.
sentences.chinese: 本設定鍵的內容是爲佈景主題製作縮圖所用的指令。

sentences.english: The partitioning key should include the columns that are used most often as predicates in queries.
sentences.chinese: 分區鍵應該將最常使用的列作爲謂詞包含在查詢中。

sentences.english: Separate complex keys or indices from their surrounding brackets.
sentences.chinese: 對複雜的鍵或索引，將其與周圍的括弧分開。
